title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 1 Sunday Reaction with Aqib Talib
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 1 Sunday Reaction with Aqib Talib
description:
Colin reacts to Matthew Stafford's debut with the Rams (3:00), the Bears taking one on the chin with Andy Dalton (5:00), how Baker Mayfield's weakness got revealed against the Chiefs (7:00), how Mac Jones reminded Colin of Dak Prescott (12:00), Aaron Rodgers' sloppy performance Sunday, and how it illustrates the difference between him and Russell Wilson (14:00). Then, Super Bowl Champ - and host of Catchin' Fades - Aqib Talib and Colin discuss the Browns' loss to the Chiefs (19:00), Mac Jones' debut (25:00), what Tua always seems to get right (26:00), if the Cardinals are a legitimate threat this season (28:00), the Packers sloppy performance against the Saints (30:00), the X-factor Jameis Winston brings to New Orleans (33:00), the Eagles' strong performance against the Falcons (35:00), and the team that Aqib says has looked the best so far (37:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
